question_text: What is the main purpose of cloning software when replacing a laptop's hard drive?
answer_options: To clean the drive before disposal
To make a complete copy of the existing drive
To reformat the drive to NTFS
To install a fresh OS from scratch
correct_answer: To make a complete copy of the existing drive
explanation: Cloning software creates an exact duplicate of the current drive's data and structure, useful during drive replacement.
